text: SELECT * FROM students With an index on and an index WHERE age < 30 on ; AND dept = 'CS' — We can retrieve the record ids satisfying AND country = "US' using the first, — Then retrieve the record ids satisfying using the second, — Take their intersection — Retrieve records and check = É SZCMU-DB ; - 12 - Query Execution | (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
